title: Alan Lightman on Stardust, Meaning, Religion, and Science
description: Physicist and author Alan Lightman talks with EconTalk host Russ Roberts about the origins of the universe, meaning, transcendence, and the relationship between science and religion.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (Library of Economics and Liberty)
content:encoded: Physicist and author Alan Lightman talks with EconTalk host Russ Roberts about the origins of the universe, meaning, transcendence, and the relationship between science and religion.
